snippet.title: Pocket God™ Episode 40: Battle of the Gods
snippet.description:
Pit Pygmy against Pygmy in an all new game, Battle of the Gods! This update also includes the Mafia Skin Pack.

Also available on the app store is Pocket God™ Comics, which now includes the exciting conclusion to "A Tale of Two Pygmies" with some big reveals and a mind-blowing cliffhanger.

What's New in this Update:
- Collect at least four idols in the Challenge of the Gods. Go to God Island on the map and set idols on the pedestals to open the temple and enter the battle arena. All the gods of the game are your enemies that you must battle. The god idols you've collected endow your fighting Pygmy with a REALM TYPE and ATTACK TYPE. A spin on the basic rock-paper-scissors mechanic, these attributes determine a Realm Winner, which activates special powers, and an Attack Winner which determines who does damage to the opponent.

- Also with this episode is the Mafia Skin Pack! Change the island statue into a Pygmy with cement shoes, the igloo into a casino, the doodler into Scarface and more!

State of the Island:
http://forums.toucharcade.com/showthread.php?t=103365
